alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hampden; Northern Worcester; Southern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 6:41PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A thunderstorm capable of producing minor flooding impacting portions of southwestern Worcester and east central Hampden Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 637 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm, producing very heavy rainfall between North Brookfield and Rutland, or about 12 miles west of Worcester, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Holden, Palmer, Spencer, Leicester, Sturbridge, Rutland, Barre, Warren, Paxton, North Brookfield, Hubbardston, West Brookfield, Brimfield, Brookfield, East Brookfield, Oakham and New Braintree. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Hampden; Northern Worcester; Southern Worcester
